name: Into the Darkness (JDavGames)
description:
"Into the Darkness" is a game created by JDavGames, which is a one-person company. This game was created for a school project in approximately a month. The game is about someone who hears a noise and goes to check it out, not knowing what they'll find. Enjoy the game.

-Controls-

[E] - Interact with items/objects.

[F] - Turn the flashlight on/off when acquired.

[WASD] - Move up, right, down, or left.

[ESC] - Turn the pause menu on.

Please let me know if there's bugs that you've noticed and I'll fix them as quick as I can.
